outline:
1. to shatter, break, dash, beat in pieces
    1. (Qal)
      1. to shatter
      2. shattering (infinitive)
    2. (Piel) to dash to pieces
    3. (Pual) to pulverise
  2. to scatter, disperse, overspread, be scattered
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be scattered
      2. dispersed (participle)
kjv_def: be beaten in sunder, break (in pieces), broken, dash (in pieces), cause to be discharged, dispersed, be overspread, scatter.
strongs_def: to dash to pieces, or scatter
